email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your recent inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Oceanic Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. The starting freight rate is in the low 50s ($50.50 per metric ton). Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate seems a bit high compared to current market levels. Would you be able to come down to the mid-40s? Also, could you confirm the vessel’s availability for the laycan? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your concerns about the rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer $48.75 per metric ton, which is competitive given the current market. The MV Oceanic Star is confirmed available for the laycan. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $48.75 sounds more reasonable. However, we’d like to lock in a demurrage rate of $20,000 per day, pro-rata, in case of delays. Can you confirm this? Also, please send over the full vessel details for our records. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I can confirm the demurrage rate of $20,000 per day, pro-rata. Attached are the full vessel details for the MV Oceanic Star. Let me know if you need anything else to finalize the deal. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good. Let’s proceed with the freight rate of $48.75 and the agreed demurrage terms. Please send over the charter party agreement for review. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear! I’ve attached the charter party agreement for your review. Let me know if there are any adjustments needed. Looking forward to finalizing this. Best, Sarah
